message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I know you'll love. It's worth a lot to me, so I'm asking for $9,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit higher than my budget. Can we meet in the middle at $7,000?
Bob, I understand you're on a budget, but $7,000 just doesn't work for me. How about we split the difference and go with $8,500? It's a fair price considering the value of this product.
I'm really interested in the product, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Can we meet at $6,800?
Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but I can't go any lower than $7,500. This product is truly special, and I'm confident it will be worth every penny to you. What do you say?
I'm willing to meet you at $6,800, but that's as low as I can go. Can we finalize the deal at this price?
